Dog.triple: Dog is a domesticated mammal.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog scientific name is Canis lupus familiaris.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog belongs to the family Canidae.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog was domesticated from wolves.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog often serves as a companion animal.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog can work as a service or working animal.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog has a keen sense of smell.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog has acute hearing.
Dog.label: common

Dog.triple: Dog communicates by barking.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog can also communicate by growling.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog sometimes communicates by whining.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog has an omnivorous diet depending on care.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog gives birth to litters of puppies.
Dog.label: common

Dog.triple: Dog develops social behavior with humans and other dogs.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog appears in many breeds and size variations.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog uses its tail for balance and communication.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog may have a dewclaw on some breeds.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog lifespan varies by breed and care.
Dog.label: common

Dog.triple: Dog is highly trainable for tasks and commands.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Dog.triple: Dog provides assistance in therapy and service roles.
Dog.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat is a small domesticated carnivorous mammal.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat scientific name is Felis catus.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat belongs to the family Felidae.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat descended from the African wildcat.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat commonly lives as a pet.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat helps control rodent populations.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat is an obligate carnivore.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat has excellent night vision.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat has very acute hearing.
Cat.label: common

Cat.triple: Cat grooms itself frequently.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat often purrs to communicate contentment.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat meows often when interacting with humans.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat has retractable claws.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat has whiskers for tactile sensing.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat gives birth to litters of kittens.
Cat.label: common

Cat.triple: Cat may be solitary or social depending on environment.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat lifespan varies by lifestyle and care.
Cat.label: common

Cat.triple: Cat is most active at dawn and dusk.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat holds longstanding cultural significance.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Cat.triple: Cat has a long history of association with humans.
Cat.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Fish are gill-bearing aquatic vertebrates.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Fish breathe using gills.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Fish are mostly ectothermic (cold-blooded).
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Fish use fins to swim.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Many fish have scales covering their bodies.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Fish include jawless, cartilaginous, and bony groups.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Many fish species reproduce by laying eggs.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Fish live in freshwater and marine habitats.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Many fish have a lateral line to detect water movement.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Many bony fish have a swim bladder for buoyancy.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Fish diets vary and include herbivores, carnivores, and omnivores.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Fish act as both consumers and predators in aquatic food webs.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Humans use fish as a major food source through fisheries and aquaculture.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Fish have paired and unpaired fins for movement.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Fish lifespans vary widely across species.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Some fish undergo larval stages and metamorphosis.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Many fish species exhibit schooling behavior.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Some fish species are capable of electroreception.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Many fish species face threats from overfishing and habitat loss.
Fish.label: topic_marker

Fish.triple: Traditional classifications consider fish a paraphyletic group.
Fish.label: topic_marker
